title: Email wont open again today, which you fixed yesterday and I donated for, can you correct the issue.Thanks. Arthur
content: The email page won't open again today on my computer, which you fixed yesterday and I donated for; I hope you can look into it and fix it. thanks. Arthur

title: wrong message content
content: Opened TB 115.11.0 (64 bit) this am A compact procedure started up. I am now left with a message whose subject is quite different from the content The next message has just come through - apparently no problem, but the original error remains. See screenshot. Not sure what to do next!
creator: billhague

title: Thunderbird email problem
content: Each time I open Thunderbird email, a page on firefox opens requesting a donation. This has been going on for weeks. I reached out to Thunderbird, and all suggestions have failed to resolve the problem. Most recently I was instructed to submit the problem here. I hope this is sufficient for requesting assistance. I would like to forward our list of communications and cannot discover a method to do so. If you send me an email address, I can give all that information. Thanks, Norma Bauer cabauer@northlink.com
creator: cabauer1030

title: Cannot Add Attachments to emails
content:
Only in the last 24 hours,I cannot add Attachements to emails I downloaded Microsoft Iview & that change Preferences on a lot of Apps Below is a examaple of it,I have tried different PDF Readers & they all do the same If I Go To The actual Folder in D Drive,then they will all open ok Please assist Thank you Darryl.Smith

D:\SCAN DOCUMENTS\D & L Smith new Certified Id Documents 2023\ID Ds Passport 2023.pdf could not be opened, because the associated helper application does not exist. Change the association in your preferences.
creator: dasmit
